exceptions.exn: In environment r : nat Hr : 2 <= r l, w : nat H : w = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) Unable to unify "power (S ?M1541) 2 - 1 = 1 + 2 * (power ?M1541 2 - 1)" with "1 + (r - 1) * w = 1 + (r - 1) * w".
Found no subterm matching "1 + (r - 1) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r)" in the current goal.

In environment H0 : forall n : nat, power (S n) 2 - 1 = S (power n 2 - 1 + (power n 2 - 1 + 0)) r : nat Hr : 2 <= r l, w : nat H : (r - 1) * w = (r - 1) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) H1 : forall n x : nat, x < power n 2 -> x ≲ power n 2 - 1 Unable to unify "?M1806 ≲ power ?M1805 2 - 1" with "w = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r)".

In environment H2 : forall n : nat, power (S n) 2 - 1 = S (power n 2 - 1 + (power n 2 - 1 + 0)) r : nat Hr : 2 <= r l, w : nat H : (r - 1) * w = (r - 1) * ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r) H0 : forall n x : nat, x ≲ power n 2 - 1 -> x < power n 2 H1 : forall n x : nat, x < power n 2 -> x ≲ power n 2 - 1 Unable to unify "2 <= r" with "w = ∑ l (fun i : nat => power i r)".

original: intros. rewrite <- all_ones_equation. split. - intro. rewrite <- H. apply power_2_minus_1. - intro. rewrite <- H. apply power_2_minus_1_gt. apply Hr.
